deprecated_platform_yaml.title: Command Line YAML configuration has moved
deprecated_platform_yaml.description:
Configuring Command Line `{platform}` using YAML has moved.

Consult the documentation to move your YAML configuration to integration key and restart Home Assistant to fix this issue.

reload.name: [%key:common::action::reload%]
reload.description: Reloads command line configuration from the YAML-configuration.
